title: Weekend with Rylie
description: Luci's whole life changes in one weekend with her boyfriend, Rylie Allen.Of course, there was the mind-blowingly good sex. It always was, but then there are secrets revealed, and a new job opportunity that would change everything between Luci and Rylie. When her ex-boyfriend comes back to haunt her, it threatens to throw their lives into further upheaval.
author: Kimberly M. Ringer
